description: League One leaders Birmingham extend their lead at the top as Kieran Dowell's 70th-minute penalty earns them victory over Lincoln.
title: Birmingham City 1-0 Lincoln City
title_page: Birmingham City 1-0 Lincoln City - BBC Sport
maintext:
Birmingham City are unbeaten across their last 15 league games against Lincoln City (W9 D6), netting 2.1 goals on average per game during that time.
This will be Lincoln City’s first visit to St Andrews to face Birmingham City in the Football League since February 1955, a match which finished 3-3 between the two sides.
Birmingham are unbeaten across their last 19 home league games (W16 D3), the Blues’ longest run at St. Andrews since a 36-match spell between October 1970 and April 1972.
